ValidationRule.description: Prevents an ADR from using the HT process for an account that is on the inside sales AE3 named list. These should be scheduled transfers to AE3s.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Hot_Transfer_To__c), NOT(ISBLANK( Hot_Transfer_To__c )),Account.SLED_Account__c = False, OR( Account.Global_Geography__c ="West",Account.Global_Geography__c ="East",Account.Global_Geography__c ="Central"), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.Inside_Sales_Assignment__c))), OR(Account.Number_of_Vehicles__c>175,Account.Number_of_Powered_Assets__c>350, Account.Number_of_Unpowered_Assets__c>1000 )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This account is on the inside sales named account list. Transfers must be performed via the "ADR Transfer" button.
